Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Cause/Adverse Event/Adverse Event by CTCAE Category/Adverse Event Associated with the Gastrointestinal System/Gastrointestinal Ulcer Adverse Event/Stomach Ulcer Adverse Event
Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Peptic Ulcer/Stomach Ulcer
Record.BroaderTerm: Adverse Event Associated with the Gastrointestinal System
Record.Description: Ulceration of the GASTRIC MUCOSA due to contact with GASTRIC JUICE. It is often associated with HELICOBACTER PYLORI infection or consumption of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS).
